title: Hernandez highlights FanFest finale
subtitle: FanFest star Felix ready for his closeup
body: SEATTLE -- Across the American League, the exploits of Felix Hernandez were well-known. It turns out that Hernandez's reach extended all the way to Japan.  "I've seen him many times on television," new Mariners catcher Kenji Johjima said through translator Ken Barron during Sunday's FanFest at Safeco Field. "I don't think I could hit him."  Fortunately for Johjima, he won't have to. The rest of the Majors aren't as lucky. Elliott Smith is a contributor for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Elliott Smith
